content:
Hi all, it seems like the comments on the Stream RFC (https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2996#issuecomment-720705737) have all been included and it's now ready to progress to the next phase in landing it.

I'm not sure what all steps in the process are for an RFC like this, but if someone from @T-libs could engage on the RFC that'd be much appreciated!

cc/ @Nell Shamrell-Harrington
